name: Squire Bots
description:
Squire Bots is a 4 person local multiplayer game where you collect gears from fallen enemies. Use a sword, shield, and laser in rock-paper-scissors combat to win!

Created by: Haidar Hammoud, Nicholas Gaunt, Noah Gale, Gary Holiday, Faulkner Bodbyl-Mast.

Further sources and credits in the CREDITS.txt file.
